description:
# Description

The Time Warp Totem temporarily boosts your cooking, crops, trees & mineral time. Make the most of it!

### Contributor

Sunflower Land is a community game built by a hundreds of developers and artists across the globe.
Come join us on [Github](https://github.com/sunflower-land/sunflower-land)

attributes.trait_type: Cooking, Crop, Tree and Mineral Time

name: Time Warp Totem
